name: Krankenheit
description:
A mad scientist stole top secret data from a bio-engineering research center to create his personal army of mutants and robotic abominations. But something goes wrong inside the fortified walls of his laboratories. Some of those mutated creations have other plans for Dr. Krankenheit.

...

Krankenheit is a first person shooter set in a dark, sci-fi world, where you play the role of a silent humanoid mutant that escaped from the laboratories of the evil scientist that held it captive. Inspired by old-school classics, the minimalist polygonal art and fast paced gunfights aim to create a fun and challenging game without making the mistake of being retro for retro's sake.

Krankenheit currently features:

  • 4 enemy types that you can slice, blow up, and riddle with bullets,
  • 5 different weapons, each with its own strengths and weaknesses,
  • A large, secret-filled level that takes 30 to 60 minutes to beat on a blind playthrough.

The game is currently in early-access, meaning that it's still being developed, and might be unstable, but by purchasing it now, you will get access to all future updates, including the final release. While we don't like the idea of selling an unfinished product, your purchases will allow us to keep working on the game and get you the best gosh darn game we're capable of making!

You can also check out our twitter account for more updates; https://twitter.com/krankenheitgame
